parameters.content:
ðŸ§  Form-to-Insight Workflow:

Upon form submission, updates Google Sheet, logs candidate in Notion, and uses Perplexity to analyze the candidate's portfolio, flagging potential plagiarism or copied content. The AI-generated summary is then sent to Slack for review.

message.content:
=Find public professional or project-related information about: {{ $json.property_first_name }} {{ $json.property_last_name }}
If available, summarize their portfolio here: {{ $json.property_portfolio_link }}

nodes.name: Perplexity to analyze the candidate's portfolio

parameters.content:
ðŸ”— Trigger:

Webhook receives Google Sheet updates via Apps Script (includes range, rowValues, etc.).

Step 1 â€“ Filter:
Check if {{ $json.body.value }} is true before continuing.

Step 2 â€“ Switch (Routing Logic):
Evaluates columnStart value (from Google Sheets) to determine the stage of the candidate:

Send Email: Test instructions

Send Email: Interview invite

Slack Invite(Add to Slack + hired message)

Send Email: Rejection

âœ‰ï¸ Gmail Nodes:
Send personalized messages using variables from rowValues.

Dynamic subjects and bodies such as:
Hey {{ $("Webhook1").item.json.body.rowValues[0]["0"] }}
allow personalized greetings.

ðŸ’¬ Slack Node:
Invites user to #new-channel based on email or Slack username extracted from Sheet.

=Hey {{ $('Webhook1').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['0'] }},

Thanks for finishing our onboarding. Everything looks great. The next steps are to complete a video editing test. Please submit your results here:
https://alvleoai.app.n8n.cloud/form-test/a70513cc-101c-47a9-92fa-1109916b4419

1. Make sure to upload your results to Google Drive
2. Make sure to set the link to public so I can view it

Please enter in the code:
{{ $('Webhook1').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['18'] }}

Best,
Alvaro

ðŸ“„ Test Submission Logger

On form submission, the flow stores the test result link in Notion, updates the candidate's row in Google Sheets, and sends a Slack message with the test link. Automates tracking and internal alerts.

ðŸŸ£ Cal.com Trigger:

Triggers when a new interview is booked.
Event: BOOKING_CREATED â†’ Automatically starts the workflow upon booking.

Google Sheets â€“ Append or Update Row
Logs or updates the candidate info in a recruitment spreadsheet.
Uses Code as the unique identifier to insert or update data.


Notion â€“ Create Database Page
Creates a new entry in the Notion recruitment database.
